review.reviewbody: Wow I played most of the game on this list. Great memories!

>>>>>>> webmaster_wompus <<<<<<<
Hey, uh... did you even try to download this or read the track list? Because every track in SimCity 3000 / Unlimited is here. If I'm missing anything after you check this out, please let me know.
>>>>>>> Masterjedi170 <<<<<<<
Me, too! The market is saturated with stuff like this now, but playing and hearing the originals will always be my favorite.
The music in these games are just amazing. I especially love SC2K's MT-32 rendition. Can't wait for The Sims collection!
Too sad ;) this makes my personal collection obsolete. Okeh one speciality is left - a mix of the MT-32 and the Waveblaster SC2K MIDI using Fatboy soundfont (and Munt to emulate the MT-32).

review.reviewtitle: No A-Train? You're not a real Simmer >:(
review.reviewbody: Or does that not count because it's not a "Sim" game?

review.reviewtitle: A Must Have for any Sim Fan
review.reviewbody: When I found this I immediately downloaded it and created a playlist. Hours upon hours upon hours of content!
thats so rare thanks so much

review.reviewtitle: I'm listening to all of this and making a short post about each game, if anyone is interested
review.reviewbody:
https://selectbutton.net/t/sim-everything-music-review/14036
I'm having a great time, some of this music is very bizarre. Thanks for the upload!!
